record.title: CONGRATULATING THE UNIVERSITY OF TENNESSEE WOMEN'S BASKETBALL TEAM

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to the consideration of S. Res. 147.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if I can just comment, that was a remarkable tournament. The final four was exciting, and the game between the Rutgers University team and the University of Tennessee was very exciting. It was high-quality basketball. I enjoyed it a lot more than the men's final four.
Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, and the motion to reconsider be laid on the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
